overview: The theater actress Lola dreamed of two things - to play seductive mistresses and get an award in Cannes. But when she is offered a long-awaited role, she learns that she should play the role not of the main character, but of her mother. This news makes Lola look back and realize that she made a mistake in choosing a career instead of a family. But Lola finds the strength to go further.
title: Lola
